posts.caption: whispersystems.org
posts.description: There is no WhatsApp 'backdoor' moxie0 on 13 Jan 2017 Today, the Guardian published a story falsely claiming that WhatsApp's end to end encryption contains a "backdoor." Background WhatsApp's encryption uses Signal Protocol, as detailed in their technical whitepaper. In systems that deploy Signal Pr...

posts.message:
Anybody here worked with Graphql before?
If yes i need some help with subscription types implementation in the back end.
I'm building my back end with c# and front end -mobile app- using react native with relay.
I've done queries and mutations, but can't find a good example on how to make subscriptions in the back end.

Thanks in advance
